sub_title: European and Dutch patent attorney at EDP PATENT ATTORNEYS B.V.
summary:
Ard is a European and Dutch patent attorney. In serving clients, Ard explores strategic opportunities for them. "No patent without strategy" is his motto.

He has experience in patent drafting/prosecution, opposition, strategic IP advice, and IP workshops since 2001. He is active in the field of inorganic chemistry, (heterogeneous) catalysis, (inorganic) materials, chemical processes, membrane reactors, foods & beverages, green technologies like renewables, biomass, energy, (bio)reactors, water purification, membrane water treatment, but also in the field of luminescent materials, optical devices, optical analysis, lanthanide spectroscopy, measuring techniques, lighting systems, (optical) medical devices, micro/nano fluidic devices, 3D printing.

Ard studied chemistry at the Utrecht University (Netherlands), with specialisations in spectroscopy at the University of Leuven (Belgium) and in zeolite catalysts at Delft University of Technology (Netherlands). He obtained a PhD in the field of solid state chemistry at the Utrecht University and worked as post-doc at the University of Berne in Switzerland. He continued his career as research scientist at OSRAM in Munich (Germany). During this period, he gained interest in intellectual property (IP) and decided to switch to IP consultancy. 

In 2001 Ard started as trainee at a top tier patent firm (NLO) in the Netherlands and became Dutch patent attorney in 2004, European patent attorney in 2005, and associate partner in 2008. In 2011, Ard was a founder of a steadily growing patent law firm in Wageningen.

Specialties: Patent drafting/prosecution, opposition, strategic IP advice, IP workshops. IP experience with: inorganic chemistry & materials; (heterogeneous) catalysis; chemical processes; foods & beverages; green tech; renewables; biomass; (bio)reactors; water purification; membranes; luminescent materials; lanthanides; measuring methods; lighting; medical and fluidic devices, systems and controlling systems.

See also our vacency for a patent attorney trainee

projects.title: Opposition Heraeus Quarzglas GmbH & Co.KG vs. EP09756182 of Koninklijke Philips N.V.
projects.description: EP09756182 patent of Koninklijke Philips N.V. was opposed by Heraeus Quarzglas GmbH & Co.KG. During oral proceedings before the European Patent Office the patent was successfully defended and the patent was maintained in amended form.

contributors.headline: European and Dutch patent attorney at EDP PATENT ATTORNEYS B.V.

projects.title: Patent infringement and nullity proceedings Sirvis vs. Medical Brands
projects.description: Sirvis – Medical Brands: successfully assisting in summary proceedings the alleged infringer Medical Brands against the plaintiff Sirvis, resulting in the judgment that the invoked claims of EP2316415B1 of the plaintiff were considered invalid and the legal costs were to be borne by the plaintiff.

contributors.headline: European and Dutch patent attorney at EDP PATENT ATTORNEYS B.V.

projects.title: Patent infringement and nullity proceedings PPG-Rhodia
projects.description: Rhodia alleged infringement by PPG in the Netherlands of the Rhodia patent of EP0520862B1; PPG (represented by Hogan Lovells with assistance from Ellens &van Essen)  tried to have the patent revoked. 4 December 2013 the Dutch part of European patent was to a large extend revoked.

contributors.headline: European and Dutch patent attorney at EDP PATENT ATTORNEYS B.V.

projects.title: Patent infringement and nullity proceedings Rhodia vs. PPG
projects.description: Rhodia vs. PPG: successfully assisting in summary proceedings the alleged infringer PPG against the plaintiff Rhodia, resulting in the judgment that the requests of Rhodia were discarded and that substantially all the legal costs were to be borne by the plaintiff.

Dr rer nat bei Universitaet Bern, DCB

profile_positions.description: The attorneys of EDP PATENT ATTORNEYS B.V. provide patent strategy advice and assist in acquiring patent rights and in opposing or nullifying rights of other parties. Furthermore, they advice in avoiding infringement and assist in infringement proceedings. To discover potential intellectual property (IP) opportunities and threats, the attorneys perform IP audits. The attorneys provide intellectual property workshops and lectures for decision makers and research scientists, to make them aware of the chances and pitfalls of intellectual property rights. Furthermore, they assist in setting up (corporate) patent strategies of existing parties like SMEs and multinationals, but also advise start-ups. In this way, the attorneys transform knowledge of the clients into value and transferable assets and improve their clients’ competitive position. Hence, we do not sell patents, we serve you with IP strategy, in line with your business strategy.
profile_positions.title: European and Dutch patent attorney

profile_positions.description: Training Dutch patent attorney trainees in drafting and defending patent applications
profile_positions.title: Tutor patent attorney trainees
